enWisdom: Treachery is betrayal
Treachery is the brother of dishonesty
The enticer [towards deviance] and the treacherous one are alike
Treachery is the double of deceit
The treacherous person has no loyalty in him
Treachery is the cornerstone of hypocrisy
The cornerstone of hypocrisy is treachery

Wisdom: الْخِيَانَةُ دَلِيلٌ عَلَى قِلَّةِ الْوَرَعِ وَعَدَمِ الدِّيَانَةِ
enWisdom: Treachery is an indication of lack of piety and absence of religiosity

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالْخِيَانَةَ فَإِنَّهَا شَرُّ مَعْصِيَةٍ وَإِنَّ الْخَائِنَ لَمُعَذَّبٌ بِالنَّارِ عَلَى خِيَانَتِهِ
enWisdom: Keep away from treachery for it is the worst offence, and verily the treacherous one is surely punished with fire for his treachery
The most detestable of morals is treachery
The worst quality is treachery
Keep away from treachery for it is [a cause of] turning away from Islam
The peak of ingratitude is disloyalty

Wisdom: شَرُّ مَا أُلْقِيَ فِي الْقُلُوبِ الْغُلُولُ
enWisdom: The worst thing that can come upon the hearts is betrayal

Wisdom: شَرُّ النَّاسِ مَنْ لَا يَعْتَقِدُ الْأَمَانَةَ وَلَا يَجْتَنِبُ الْخِيَانَةَ
enWisdom: The worst person is one who neither keeps the trust [that has been placed in his care] nor does he avoid treachery

Wisdom: الْخَائِنُ مَنْ شَغَلَ نَفْسَهُ بِغَيْرِ نَفْسِهِ وَكَانَ يَوْمُهُ شَرّاً مِنْ أَمْسِهِ
enWisdom: The treacherous person is one who busies himself with other than his self and his ‘today’ is worse than his ‘yesterday’
The worst treachery is treachery against the nation

Wisdom: طَلَبُ التَّعَاوُنِ عَلَى نُصْرَةِ الْبَاطِلِ جِنَايَةٌ وَخِيَانَةٌ
enWisdom: Seeking assistance in support of falsehood is a serious offence and an act of treachery
Whoever betrays his king, his security is nullified

Wisdom: مَنْ عَمِلَ بِالْخِيَانَةِ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ الْأَمَانَةَ
enWisdom: One who acts with treachery has done injustice to the trust [that was entrusted to him]
From the signs of being forsaken [by Allah] is considering the treacherous to be trustworthy

Wisdom: لَا تَخُنْ مَنِ ائْتَمَنَكَ وَإِنْ خَانَكَ وَلَا تَشِنْ عَدُوَّكَ وَإِنْ شَانَكَ
enWisdom: Do not act treacherously towards one who trusts you, even if he is disloyal with you, and do not disgrace your enemy, even if he disgraces you
There is no good in the testimony of the treacherous
